itl.enabler.api

Interface Pump.PumpEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Pump.PumpEventAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    Pump

    public static interface Pump.PumpEventListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Event Listener for the Pump class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFuellingProgress(FuellingProgressEventArgs ev)
      This event is fired regularly during the fuelling progress when the running totals have been updated in the current fuel transaction
      void onHoseEvent(PumpHoseEventArgs ev)
      This event is fired when a Hose is LIFTED, REPLACED or LEFT_OUT
      void onJournalEvent(JournalEventArgs ev)
      Pump events for this pump that have been recorded in the system event journal
      void onPriceChange(java.util.EventObject ev)
      This event is fired when the price change status has changed for this pump
      void onStatusChange(PumpStatusEventArgs ev)
      This event is fired when one of the following change status: State Blocked Unblocked Pump Lights
      void onTransactionEvent(PumpTransactionEventArgs ev)
      This event is fired for the following pump transaction events: RESERVED AUTHORISED FUELLING COMPLETED LOCKED UNLOCKED STACKED CLEARED REINSTATED

    • Method Detail

      • onFuellingProgress

        void onFuellingProgress(FuellingProgressEventArgs ev)
        This event is fired regularly during the fuelling progress when the running totals have been updated in the current fuel transaction

      • onHoseEvent

        void onHoseEvent(PumpHoseEventArgs ev)
        This event is fired when a Hose is LIFTED, REPLACED or LEFT_OUT

      • onJournalEvent

        void onJournalEvent(JournalEventArgs ev)
        Pump events for this pump that have been recorded in the system event journal

      • onPriceChange

        void onPriceChange(java.util.EventObject ev)
        This event is fired when the price change status has changed for this pump

      • onStatusChange

        void onStatusChange(PumpStatusEventArgs ev)
        This event is fired when one of the following change status:
        • State
        • Blocked
        • Unblocked
        • Pump Lights

      • onTransactionEvent

        void onTransactionEvent(PumpTransactionEventArgs ev)
        This event is fired for the following pump transaction events:
        • RESERVED
        • AUTHORISED
        • FUELLING
        • COMPLETED
        • LOCKED
        • UNLOCKED
        • STACKED
        • CLEARED
        • REINSTATED
